title: express-api
description: Super simple nodejs express webserver api with authentication, authorization, job scheduler and mongodb.

title: mrRemote for Kodi
description: mrRemote for Kodi is a Kodi/Xbmc remote control for Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile. Developed with Visual Studio using C#/Xaml and released opensource on Github.
